name: Fundraising Text Campaigns
short_description: Texting Base is a web-based software, which adds efficiency and power to business texting communications.  Texting Base combines the efficiency of a “mass text” and the power of a personal text message.  Their patent pending software allows businesses strengthen customer relationships.  No matter how many people are being messaged, each person receives a personalized text. Texting Base can be used any business purpose that involves communication.  Using Texting Base for mobile fundraising texts has become a common way the software works. Texting Base allows you to write and schedule your text communications for hours or years in advance to selected contacts quickly and have each message be meaningful. Send meaningful messages to meaningful people, and save a lot of time doing it. Texting Base…Live Efficient.
